item.title: NYT、WaPo、Disney、NBCUniversalを含む業界団体が草案で、出版社のアーカイブで作られたAIツールは著作権法を破る可能性があると警告している（Ryan Barwick/Marketing Brew）。
item.description:
Ryan Barwick / Marketing Brew:
In a draft, a trade group including the NYT, WaPo, Disney, and NBCUniversal warns publishers that AI tools built on their archives could break copyright laws  —  A publishers' trade association— which includes the New York Times, the Washington Post, Disney, and NBCUniversal …

item.title: Mirror Groupは、ハリー王子がハッキングされた「証拠はない」とし、同社のジャーナリストがダイアナ妃の電話をハッキングしたという指摘を「まったくの憶測」と呼ぶ（Press Gazette）。
item.description:
Press Gazette:
Mirror Group says there is “no evidence” Prince Harry was hacked and calls a suggestion that its journalists hacked Princess Diana's phone “total speculation”  —  Prince Harry's individual case against Mirror Group Newspapers opened on Monday.

item.title: ディズニーCEOのボブ・アイガー氏、映画館機能を持つ3499ドルのApple Vision Proヘッドセットで、2024年初頭の発売時にDisney+を利用できると発表（Aisha Malik/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Aisha Malik / TechCrunch:
Disney CEO Bob Iger announces that Disney+ will be available on the $3,499 Apple Vision Pro headset, which has a movie theater feature, at launch in early 2024  —  At Apple's Worldwide Developers Conference (WWDC) today, Disney CEO Bob Iger announced that Disney+ will be available on the tech giant's new Apple Vision Pro at launch.

item.title: ディズニーの実写リメイクを担当し、ストーリーを逆行させない方法を見つけ、ディズニーを文化的な戦いに巻き込むショーン・ベイリーのプロフィール（Brooks Barnes/New York Times)
item.description:
Brooks Barnes / New York Times:
A profile of Sean Bailey, who is in charge of Disney's live-action remakes and finds ways to make stories less retrograde, putting Disney in cultural fights  —  Sean Bailey is in charge of live-action remakes of films like “The Little Mermaid.”  It's a job that puts him in the middle of a partisan divide.

item.title: ウクライナのアウトレット44社を対象にした調査：~64％がロシアの戦争前よりスタッフが増え、～50％が助成金資金が50％以上増え、44％が読者から資金援助を受けていると回答（Bron Maher/Press Gazette)
item.description:
Bron Maher / Press Gazette:
A survey of 44 Ukrainian outlets: ~64% have more staff than before Russia's war, ~50% say grant funding is up by 50%+, and 44% get financial help from readers  —  Research suggests Ukraine's local newsrooms are on firmer financial footing this year.  —  The past year has seen an increase …

item.title: ウクライナとの国境にあるロシアの一部都市のテレビ・ラジオ局が、6月5日にプーチンが戒厳令を宣言した深層フェイク映像を放送、ロシアは「ハッキング」と非難（Jenna Moon/Semafor)
item.description:
Jenna Moon / Semafor:
TV and radio stations in some Russian cities on Ukraine's border broadcast a deep fake video of Putin declaring martial law on June 5; Russia blames a “hack”  —  The News  —  A deep fake video depicting Russian President Vladimir Putin declaring martial law and warning …

item.title: ポッドキャストネットワークWonderyが、元Netflixのオーディオ担当とApple Podcastsのコンテンツ担当だったN'Jeri Eatonをリミテッドシリーズの共同制作担当として採用 (Todd Spangler/Variety)
item.description:
Todd Spangler / Variety:
Podcast network Wondery hires N'Jeri Eaton, formerly Netflix's head of audio and Apple Podcasts' head of content, as head of co-productions for limited series  —  N'Jeri Eaton, former head of audio at Netflix and head of content at Apple Podcasts, is joining Wondery as head of co-productions for limited series.

item.title: 情報源: スタッフコールで、クリス・リヒトはアトランティックのプロフィールに応え、信頼を取り戻すために努力する、オフィスをニュースルームに戻す、などと述べた（Brian Steinberg/Variety)
item.description:
Brian Steinberg / Variety:
Sources: in a staff call, Chris Licht responded to an Atlantic profile, saying he will strive to win back trust, move his office back to the newsroom, and more  —  CNN chief Chris Licht told staffers Monday he wants to help them make the news rather than being a central figure in it.

item.title: 6月5日、ガネット社のジャーナリスト数百人が、地方ニュースルームの縮小に抗議するため、同社史上最大の労働争議として職を離れた（Katie Robertson/New York Times）。
item.description:
Katie Robertson / New York Times:
Hundreds of Gannett journalists walked off the job on June 5 to protest the decimation of local newsrooms, in the biggest labor action in the company's history  —  The union representing the company's newsroom employees has urged a vote of no-confidence against the C.E.O. at a shareholder meeting on Monday.

item.title: SAG-AFTRAは、新しい3年契約の交渉のために6月7日にスタジオ幹部と会う予定だが、俳優がAIデジタルダブルの仕事に対して報酬を支払うことを求めている（Christopher Grimes/Financial Times）。
item.description:
Christopher Grimes / Financial Times:
SAG-AFTRA, which plans to meet studio executives on June 7 to negotiate a new three-year contract, seeks that actors are paid for their AI digital doubles' work  —  Unions fear artificial intelligence could cause artists to lose control of their image while making writers obsolete

item.title: Spotify、ポッドキャスト部門でスタッフの2%にあたる〜200人を削減、ParcastとGimletをリニューアルしたSpotify Studiosに統合、100M以上のポッドキャストリスナーを報告 (Sahar Elhabashi/Spotify)
item.description:
Sahar Elhabashi / Spotify:
Spotify cuts ~200 jobs, or 2% of its staff, at its podcast unit, combines Parcast and Gimlet into a renewed Spotify Studios, and reports 100M+ podcast listeners  —  Below is an adaptation of an internal update on Spotify's Podcast Business from Sahar Elhabashi, VP, Head of Podcast Business.

item.title: 内部資料です：Twitterの4月1日から5月第1週までの米国での広告収入は前年同期比59%減の$88M、情報筋によると、業績はすぐに改善しそうにないとのこと（New York Times）．
item.description:
New York Times:
Internal document: Twitter's US ad revenue from April 1 to the first week of May fell 59% YoY to $88M; sources say that performance is unlikely to improve soon  —  In internal forecasts, the company projected that ad sales would keep declining, handing a tough challenge to its new chief executive.

item.title: ViaplayのCEO、Anders Jensen氏が5年ぶりに退任、景気悪化による加入者離れと広告市場の悪化、第2四半期の広告売上は12％～16％減少か（Max Goldbart/Deadline）
item.description:
Max Goldbart / Deadline:
Viaplay CEO Anders Jensen steps down after five years, as an economic downturn causes subscriber churn and ad market deterioration; Q2 ad sales may drop 12%-16%  —  Viaplay Group CEO Anders Jensen is stepping down immediately amidst an economic downturn that is causing rapid deterioration in the ad market and subscriber churn.

item.title: 香港の最高裁判所が、2019年の暴徒襲撃事件に対する警察の対応を調査したジャーナリスト、バオ・チョイの有罪判決を覆し、報道の自由にとって珍しい勝利となった（Kari Soo Lindberg/Bloomberg)
item.description:
Kari Soo Lindberg / Bloomberg:
Hong Kong's top court overturns the conviction of Bao Choy, a journalist who investigated the police response to a 2019 mob attack, a rare win for press freedom  —  Hong Kong's top court overturned the conviction of a journalist who investigated the police response to a 2019 mob attack …

item.title: WaymarkがDALL-E 2を使って作成した12分のムービー「The Frost」の様子、WaymarkやRunwayなどのスタートアップが高速かつ安価な映像制作のためのAIツールを作る（Will Douglas Heaven/MIT Technology Review）
item.description:
Will Douglas Heaven / MIT Technology Review:
A look at The Frost, a 12-minute movie created by Waymark using DALL-E 2, as startups like Waymark and Runway make AI tools for fast and cheap video production  —  Exclusive: Watch the world premiere of the AI-generated short film The Frost.  —  The Frost nails its uncanny, disconcerting vibe in its first few shots.
